verses.1: Tua ahih manin Pasianʼ sapna a ngah mi siangthote aw, eiteʼ upna thu tawh kisai ah Siampi Lianpen a sem dingin Pasianʼ sawltak Jesuʼ thu ngaihsun dih un.
verses.2: Pasianʼ inn sungah na a sepna ah Moses a cihtak mah bangin hih siampi nasep a sem dingin a seh Pasianʼ tungah Jesu a citak hi.
verses.3: Ahi zongin inn a lam pa pen a inn sangin a minthan zawk mah bangin Moses sangin Jesu pahtawi zawk ding ahi hi.
verses.4: Inn khempeuh a lam na om ciat sam a, ahi zongin na khempeuh a piangsak pa pen Pasian ahi hi.
verses.5: Moses pen nasem khat hihna tawh Pasianʼ inn sungah thu khempeuh ah citak a, mailam hunah Pasian in a gen ding thute a gen hi.
verses.6: Ahi zongin Khris pen Pasianʼ inn sung a uk Tapa ahihna tawh a citak ahi hi. I lametna thu tawh kisai-in lungsim hanna le muanna tawh i omsuak nakleh eite pen Pasianʼ inn ihi hi.
verses.7: Tua ahih ciangin Lai Siangtho sungah, “Tu ni-in Pasianʼ aw na zak uh leh
verses.8: gamlak ah na om lai-un amah ze-etin, Pasian na lehdo lai hun uh bangin na lungsim uh khauhsak nawn kei un.
verses.9: Na pu na pate un kum sawm li sung ka nasepnate mu napi-in kei hong ze-et veve uh hi.
verses.10: Tua ahih manin amaute tungah ka heh a, ‘Amaute citak lo niloh uh a, ka thukhamte zui nuam lo uh hi,’ ka ci hi.
verses.11: Ka heh manin ka kiciam a, ‘Ka tawlngakna munah hong pai-in kei tawh hong tawlnga khawm ngei lo ding uh hi,’ ka ci hi,” na ci hi.
verses.12: Sanggamte aw, a nungta Pasian kiang panin a paikhia zah dingin thu um lo, a gilo na om khak loh nadingun na kingaihsun un.
verses.13: Lai Siangtho in, “Tu ni,” a cih pen eite tungah zong hong cihna hi lai ahih manin mawhnaʼ khem sa-in ta-in na lungsim uh na khauhsak khak loh nadingun khatlekhat kihanthawnin na kihuh zaw un.
verses.14: A kipat tungin i neih lungmuanna kip takin i let ciat nakleh i vekpi-in Khris tawh pawl khat ihi hi.
verses.15: Lai Siangtho in, “Tu ni-in Pasianʼ aw na zak uh leh Pasian na lehdo lai uh hun bangin na lungsim uh khauhsak nawn kei un,” na ci hi.
verses.16: Pasianʼ aw za napi-in amah a lehdo kuate ahi hiam? Moses in Egypt gam panin a paikhiatpih mi khempeuh ahi uh hi.
verses.17: Kum sawm li sung kuate tungah Pasian heh ahi hiam? Mawhna bawlin, gamlak ah a si mite tung ahi hi.
verses.18: Thupi takin Pasian kiciamin, “Ka tawlngakna munah hong pai-in, kei tawh tawlnga ngei lo ding uh hi,” a cih ciangin kuate a cihnopna ahi hiam? Amah a lehdote a cihna ahi hi.
verses.19: Tua ahih manin a up lohna uh hangin tawlngakna munah a lut zawh lohna uh i thei hi.
